DOC.brief_title: The Antalgic Effect Pulse Frequency Pad Size TENS Blunt Pressure Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Potential participant express interest study give read contraindication pain test stimulation intervention , document consent form . All participant meet entry requirement invited participate experiment take place separate occasion . Each participant sign consent form tell withdraw study time without explanation . Each participant require experience 10-minute pre-stimulation period , 30 minute TENS intervention , 30 minute follow-up period . Participants seat chair arm support provide side table . The investigator informed stimulation intervention use pad size stimulation period write form contain seal envelope . After participant 's verbal permission obtain , investigator apply pad dorsal forearm area . Either large size pad , 5cm x 10cm , small size,2.5cm x 2.5cm , choose place dorsal side forearm straddle site blunt pressure pain . The muscle belly forearm mainly locate proximal half part . The proximal pad attach lateral epi-condyle elbow , distal electrode place 3cm distal proximal one along line lateral part elbow mid-point wrist . The pad connect intervention stimulator . The investigator relay instruction participant use cue card display 30 second require action . Before blunting pressure pain test , participant sit comfortably place right upper extremity side table shoulder abduction , elbow flexion , forearm pronation . The test induce use pressure algometer flat circular probe , measure 1.1cm diameter ( 1cm2 skin surface ) . Force display digitally increment 0.1 Newton . The algometer apply mid-point intervention pad . The rate pressure algometer application around 6 Newtons per second average . The participant ask concentrate sensation forearm . When pressure become definitely painful , participant state `` Pain ! '' force stop . The pain threshold take twice minute one test measurement take 30 second . There seven 1-minute test perform experiment . The first test pre-stimulation period . The second third test administer start 9 , 19 , 29 minute time point stimulation-on period . A 30 minute post stimulation period follow . Another 3 test perform period ten-minute interval 39 , 49 , 59 minute time point stimulation start .
DOC.criteria: Healthy age 18 year Any open wound around arm hand area , include edema inflammation ; Cardiac vascular problem ( coronary artery disease , coronary thrombosis , angina pain , high blood pressure , phlebitis , pacemaker implantation ) ; Any dermatological problem infection around hand , forearm , arm area ( dermatitis eczema , bacterial fungal infection ) ; Any history neoplasm malignancy ; Bleeding diseases arm hand ( haemorrhage ) ; Menstruation pregnancy ; Abnormal neurological sign upper limb ( altered skin sensation ) ; Hypersensitivity phobia electrical application ; Any current medication regime .
